About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Some information about me

Hello my name is Zaid Qassim. I was born on June 27 1997 in Iraq-Najaf. I am Student at the Iraqi University in the city of Baghdad I am Studying in College of Engineering-Department Networks now, but I want to study Master later.I am from Iraq, So my native language is Arabic. I am interested in Technology in general and I like programming. My ambition is to be a professional in ( programming , Development , Design , ….) .

2016-2018

Iraqi University – BS in College of Engineering - The first language to be learned is the C ++ language, Hence I started in the field of programming and technical world, I began to learn some languages from sources outside the universit, for example, and also mastered the basics of the computer.

Some information about me

SOLOLEARN - A CERTIFCATE OF APPRECIATION - Learn the programming language C# and worked on the framework Xamarin for 6 months and has completed 2 application on Google Play. - Then I moved to learning web programming I learned HTML , CSS ,and JS , and I was learned ASP.Net MVC. He started working on projects and programming many sites for more than a year.
